text:
@Yamiche That's about 4,800 deaths per day a few weeks later, based on current US COVID-19 mortality rates per https://t.co/DlDpXhbtm5
I think I will easily cover my bet on 250k confirmed deaths this year. Thanks for the help, #TraitorTrump.
